 1: {VV##85 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##86}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Data.Set_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Data.Set
 6: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: 
10: embed Data.Set.Internal.Set as Set_Set
11: 
12: //  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13: //  -- | Logical Set Operators: Interpreted "natively" by the SMT solver -------------------------
14: //  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15: 
16: 
17: //  union
18: measure Set_cup  :: (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
19: 
20: //  intersection
21: measure Set_cap  :: (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
22: 
23: //  difference
24: measure Set_dif   :: (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
25: 
26: //  singleton
27: measure Set_sng   :: a -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
28: 
29: //  emptiness test
30: measure Set_emp   :: (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> GHC.Types.Bool
31: 
32: //  empty set
33: measure Set_empty :: forall a. GHC.Types.Int -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
34: 
35: //  membership test
36: measure Set_mem  :: a -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> GHC.Types.Bool
37: 
38: //  inclusion test
39: measure Set_sub  :: (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> GHC.Types.Bool
40: 
41: //  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
42: //  -- | Refined Types for Data.Set Operations --------------------------------------------------
43: //  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
44: 
45: assume Data.Set.Internal.isSubsetOf    :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> y:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | v <=> Set_sub x y}
46: assume Data.Set.Internal.member        :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | v <=> Set_mem x xs}
47: assume Data.Set.Internal.null          :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | v <=> Set_emp xs}
48: 
49: assume Data.Set.Internal.empty         :: {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | Set_emp v}
50: assume Data.Set.Internal.singleton     :: x:a -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = (Set_sng x)}
51: assume Data.Set.Internal.insert        :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = Set_cup xs (Set_sng x)}
52: assume Data.Set.Internal.delete        :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = Set_dif xs (Set_sng x)}
53: 
54: assume Data.Set.Internal.union         :: GHC.Classes.Ord a => xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> ys:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = Set_cup xs ys}
55: assume Data.Set.Internal.intersection  :: GHC.Classes.Ord a => xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> ys:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = Set_cap xs ys}
56: assume Data.Set.Internal.difference    :: GHC.Classes.Ord a => xs:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> ys:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) -> {v:(Data.Set.Internal.Set a) | v = Set_dif xs ys}
57: 
58: assume Data.Set.Internal.fromList :: GHC.Classes.Ord a => xs:[a] -> {v:Data.Set.Internal.Set a | v = listElts xs}
59: assume Data.Set.Internal.toList   :: GHC.Classes.Ord a => s:Data.Set.Internal.Set a -> {xs:[a] | s = listElts xs}
60: 
61: //  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
62: //  -- | The set of elements in a list ----------------------------------------------------------
63: //  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
64: 
65: measure listElts :: [a] -> (Data.Set.Internal.Set a)
66:   listElts []     = {v | (Set_emp v)}
67:   listElts (x:xs) = {v | v = Set_cup (Set_sng x) (listElts xs) }
68: 
69: @-}
